name: BioThreat 7
description:
The player directly controls Ethan Winters as he searches for his missing wife. Despite being a civilian with little combat skill, Ethan is able to arm himself with a variety of weapons, including pistols, shotguns, firebombs, explosives, and chainsaws against the estate's residents, the Baker family, and "humanoid mushrooms. Fungi." . and mutated insects. He can block attacks to minimize damage. Various parts of the game are spent chasing down members of the Baker family, who are only temporarily incapacitated if they engage in combat. However, these encounters can be avoided by hiding or running away.

Based on the popular Video Game. It is not intended to inflict copyright, but for educational purposes.
